title: Modern Combat 5: Blackout mod and normal
description:
Step into the action as the latest installment in the best FPS series raises the bar for shooter games once more! Create a squad, add your friends and test your individual and team skills against other squads in dynamic multiplayer warfare!

Is single player your thing? Then step into a world on the brink of anarchy and shoot your way out of one dire situation after another to expose a lunatic whoâ€™s trying to tear the world to shreds.

CHOOSE YOUR FAVORITE CLASS
â€¢ 6 customizable classes that you can level up across single- and multiplayer 
â€¢ Find the playstyle that suits you: Assault, Heavy, Recon, Sniper, Support or Bounty Hunter
â€¢ Activate class-specific skills by earning and spending Skill Points

HIGH-POWERED MULTIPLAYER 
â€¢ Epic team clashes in Squad vs. Squad matches
â€¢ Talk to other players in Global and Squad Chat
â€¢ Individual and Squad leaderboards 
â€¢ Win cool rewards in the limited-time events

UNIFIED GAME PROGRESSION
â€¢ Accumulate XP and level up by playing both single-player missions and multiplayer matches
â€¢ Unlock higher-tier weapons by mastering lower-tier ones
â€¢ Customize the perfect weapon using a host of attachments and jump straight into the action

INTENSE SOLO CAMPAIGN 
> Fast-paced story missions with various challenges taking you from Tokyo to Venice
> Play the new Spec-Ops missions for a real FPS adrenaline rush
> Flawless graphics, music and voice performances perfectly adapted for a shooter game 

HIGHLY CUSTOMIZABLE CONTROLS
â€¢ Intuitive, highly customizable controls so you can play the game just the way you want
Modern Combat 5 supports HID game controllers. Moga Pro is also supported, in mode B (HID Mode).

Whatâ€™s new:
Happy holidays! Update now and enjoy the presents:
A NEW CLASS: BOUNTY HUNTER
-Earn Diamond Dust with every multiplayer kill
-Tomorrowâ€™s firepower is in your hands â€“ including the awe-inspiring Railgun!
-The default armor inflicts burn damage over time
NEW SPECIAL EVENT
-Test your reflexes in the one-shot, one-kill Instagib events
SANTA'S GOT PRESENTS
-Unlock and equip the new Santa armor â€“ then you get to decide who's naughty and who's nice!
-New Christmassy masks, trinkets, camos!

Mod Info:
â€¢ Unlimited money
â€¢ Removed License Check

Modern Combat 5 requires an Internet connection.
Requires Android OS: 4.0+
